basic.description: This course is a practice-oriented land development design course integration geometric  layout, earthwork grading, storm water management, potable water distribution, wastewater collection, regulatory compliance, and financial considerations.
basic.subject: CGN
basic.title: Site Development

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: CEG 2202, CEG 2202L, CWR 4202, CWR 4203, TTE 3004, TTE 4201, or TTE 4804 or equivalents.
